ygData.subject: Tinkering skill cap, fixed?
ygData.msgSnippet: I just read that the patch that was supposed to be this morning was actually already done.  They did it when the servers were down with that Cerfnet and UUnet
ygData.messageBody:
I just read that the patch that was supposed to be this morning was actually
already done. They did it when the servers were down with that Cerfnet and
UUnet trouble. Anyway, I was wondering if anyone has tried the tinkering
skill since the patch to see if the skill cap (I think it was (Level - 15) x
5) has been fixed yet. I had been hoping that they would fix it in this
patch after someone reported that a GM said they should be fixing it soon,
maybe even in the next patch. If anyone knows if you can Tinker outside the
level cap now please say so =)

Logalog,
Veeshan Server
